description: React context provider module for managing authentication state, including login, registration, token management, and user info, using JWT backend endpoints.

methods.name: normalizeUser(user)
methods.description: Normalizes user object to ensure consistent structure with string id and optional fields.

methods.name: AuthProvider({ children })
methods.description: React context provider component managing authentication state, including login, registration, mock login, and logout functions.

methods.name: useAuth()
methods.description: Custom hook for accessing authentication context values.
